summary: This mod adds a standalone longsword to Skyrim, based on a Billyro sword. Require Dragonborn.esm/dlc.
descriptionHtml:
Longsword
By Billyro & Setvi

Description

This mod adds a standalone longsword to Skyrim, based on a Billyro sword. It can be crafted with the ebony smithing perk. The sword is two-handed.
Require Dragonborn.esm/dlc.

Compatibility

Compatible with everything. If the .esp name is not compatible with another .esp (same name) you can safely rename it as you wish.
Don't forget to rename the .bsa if you use the .bsa version.

Installation

Choose your language (English or French).
Choose the .esp/.bsa version or the .esp/meshes & textures version, copy the .esp/.bsa or the .esp/meshes & textures folder to your Skyrim\Data folder.
Don't forget to activate the .esp.

Permissions

Feel free to use what I've done in your own mods (the .esp).
For the meshes/textures/.bsa, you must send a message to Billyro before using or redistributing.

Changelog

1.0 - Initial release

Credit

Humus - cubemap base.

Tools used - NifSkope, GIMP 2, Creation Kit, TES5Edit.

Billyro - thank you.
author: Billyro And Setvi
